org.sxb.web.util

クラス UriUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sxb.web.util.UriUtils

  • public abstract class UriUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    未使用 Utility class for URI encoding and decoding based on RFC 3986. Offers encoding methods for the various URI components.

    All encode*(String, String methods in this class operate in a similar way:

    • Valid characters for the specific URI component as defined in RFC 3986 stay the same.
    • All other characters are converted into one or more bytes in the given encoding scheme. Each of the resulting bytes is written as a hexadecimal string in the "%<i>xy</i>" format.
    導入されたバージョン:
    3.0
    作成者:
    Arjen Poutsma
    関連項目:
    RFC 3986

      • encodeScheme

        public static java.lang.String encodeScheme(java.lang.String scheme,
                                            java.lang.String encoding)
                                     throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Encodes the given URI scheme with the given encoding.
        パラメータ:
        scheme - the scheme to be encoded
        encoding - the character encoding to encode to
        戻り値:
        the encoded scheme
        例外:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException - when the given encoding parameter is not supported

      • decode

        public static java.lang.String decode(java.lang.String source,
                                      java.lang.String encoding)
                               throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Decodes the given encoded source String into an URI. Based on the following rules:
        • Alphanumeric characters "a" through "z", "A" through "Z", and "0" through "9" stay the same.
        • Special characters "-", "_", ".", and "*" stay the same.
        • A sequence "%<i>xy</i>" is interpreted as a hexadecimal representation of the character.
        パラメータ:
        source - the source string
        encoding - the encoding
        戻り値:
        the decoded URI
        例外:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when the given source contains invalid encoded sequences
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException - when the given encoding parameter is not supported
        関連項目:
        URLDecoder.decode(String, String)
